name: tgpcn
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, ctgp), wcel(c1, co(co(c2, ctx, c2), ccn, c2)))

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, ctgp), wcel(c1, co(co(c2, ctx, c2), ccn, c2)), wcel(c0, ctmd))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ctgp), wcel(c1, co(co(c2, ctx, c2), ccn, c2)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ctgp), wcel(c0, ctmd))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ctmd), wcel(c1, co(co(c2, ctx, c2), ccn, c2)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ TopGrp → c1 ∈((c2[tX]c2)[Cn]c2))
⊣ (c0 ∈ TopGrp → c0 ∈ TopMnd)
⊣ (c0 ∈ TopMnd → c1 ∈((c2[tX]c2)[Cn]c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ctgp), wcel(c1, co(co(c2, ctx, c2), ccn, c2)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ctgp), wcel(c0, ctmd))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ctmd), wcel(c1, co(co(c2, ctx, c2), ccn, c2)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ TopGrp → c1 ∈((c2[tX]c2)[Cn]c2))
⊣ (c0 ∈ TopGrp → c0 ∈ TopMnd)
⊣ (c0 ∈ TopMnd → c1 ∈((c2[tX]c2)[Cn]c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ctgp), wcel(c1, co(co(c2, ctx, c2), ccn, c2)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ctmd), wcel(c1, co(co(c2, ctx, c2), ccn, c2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ctmd), wcel(c1, co(co(c2, ctx, c2), ccn, c2)))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(ctopn, c0))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cplusf, c0))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ TopMnd → c1 ∈((c2[tX]c2)[Cn]c2))
⊣ c2 =(TopOpen ` c0)
⊣ c1 =(+f ` c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ctgp), wcel(c1, co(co(c2, ctx, c2), ccn, c2)))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(ctopn, c0))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cplusf, c0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ TopGrp → c1 ∈((c2[tX]c2)[Cn]c2))
⊣ c2 =(TopOpen ` c0)
⊣ c1 =(+f ` c0)

comment: In a topological group, the operation ` F ` representing the functionalization of the operator slot ` +g ` is continuous. (Contributed by FL, 21-Jun-2010.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Aug-2015.)
